activity: Solo Visit to the Allwetterzoo Münster
description: Enjoy a peaceful solo visit to Allwetterzoo, Münster's renowned zoo. Take your time exploring various animal exhibits and the beautiful park-like environment.

locationInfo.description: A family-friendly zoo with both indoor and outdoor exhibits, including an aquarium and various animal enclosures. A great place for a solo wander among wildlife.
safetyTips: Bring a small snack or water to stay refreshed.
Respect the animals and follow zoo rules.

activity: Solo Coffee and People Watching at Prinzipalmarkt
description: Enjoy a warm drink while observing the lively atmosphere of Münster's historic market square, Prinzipalmarkt, which is full of character and charm.

locationInfo.description: A historic square in the heart of Münster, surrounded by stunning architecture, restaurants, and cafés. A perfect spot to sit and enjoy a coffee while watching the world go by.
safetyTips: Keep an eye on your belongings while seated outside.
Consider wearing layers to stay warm on chilly days.
Enjoy the atmosphere and take your time.

description: Take a reflective solo walk through Schlosspark, Münster's royal park. Enjoy the peaceful surroundings, historical trees, and beautiful landscapes.

locationInfo.description: A charming park around the Schloss Münster (University Castle), ideal for a leisurely walk amidst greenery, sculptures, and historic buildings.
safetyTips: Stay warm and dress in layers during colder days.
Be mindful of cyclists on shared paths.
Bring a camera to capture the scenic beauty.

activity: Solo Visit to the Mühlenhof Open-Air Museum
description: Explore Münster's rich cultural history at the Mühlenhof Open-Air Museum. Stroll through traditional farmhouses, windmills, and historical exhibits.

locationInfo.description: An outdoor museum featuring old rural buildings, including windmills and farmhouses, showcasing life in the region's past.
safetyTips: Wear comfortable shoes for walking on uneven surfaces.
Check the weather forecast before visiting.
Respect the historical artifacts and structures.

activity: Solo Art Viewing at LWL Museum for Art and Culture
description: Spend time appreciating the artistic collections at the LWL Museum in Münster, from medieval art to contemporary works, all at your own pace.

locationInfo.pathNameOrLocationName: LWL Museum for Art and Culture
locationInfo.description: A museum showcasing an extensive collection of art from different periods, perfect for those looking to immerse themselves in creativity and history.
safetyTips: Do not touch the artwork to preserve its condition.
Stay aware of museum policies and exhibit guidelines.
Use the museum map to navigate to your favorite exhibits.
